metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23901 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
A stack overflow re2c 2.2 exists due to infinite recursion issues insrc/dfa/dead_rules.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23901` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

re2c - 3.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: re2c package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0-1').
